questions.question: When the crest of one wave meets with the trough of another wave,
Which of the following is true when two waves interfere?

answers.a: The total energy will be conserved.
answers.b: The total energy will not be conserved.
answers.c: The total energy will be conserved only in the case of constructive interference.
answers.d: he total energy will be conserved only in the case of destructive interference.
